Notes: Required field. Maps to did_police_attend in Typeform but uses different field name (police_attended vs did_police_attend)
Optional field shown only if police_attended='yes'. Maps to accident_reference_number in Typeform but uses different field name (accident_ref_number vs accident_reference_number)
Optional field shown only if police_attended='yes'. Maps to police_force_details in Typeform but uses different field name (police_force vs police_force_details)
Optional field shown only if police_attended='yes'. Maps to police_officers_name in Typeform but uses different field name (officer_name vs police_officers_name)
Optional field shown only if police_attended='yes'. Maps to police_officer_badge_number in Typeform but uses different field name (officer_badge vs police_officer_badge_number)

Optional field shown only if police_attended='yes'. Maps to breath_test in Typeform but uses different field name (user_breath_test vs breath_test). Options: not_tested, negative_0mg, below_limit, at_limit, above_limit, refused, unable

Optional field shown only if police_attended='yes'. Perfect match - same field name in frontend and database. Options: unknown, not_tested, negative_0mg, below_limit, at_limit, above_limit, refused, arrested
Required field. Perfect match - same field name in frontend and database. Values: yes, no
Required field. Maps to wearing_seatbelts in Typeform but uses different field name (seatbelts_worn vs wearing_seatbelts). Values: yes, no
Required if seatbelts_worn='no'. Minimum 5 chars. Maps to reason_no_seatbelts in Typeform but uses different field name (seatbelt_reason vs reason_no_seatbelts). Max 500 chars with counter
